content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    anno , 
    AVG(cast(dd_valor as decimal)) as ddvalor ,
    AVG(cast(ff_valor as decimal)) as ffvalor
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlswaltercalcagno.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/viento/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP by anno  order by anno DESC
